title: Oil Steadies After Biggest Drop Since June With Focus on Iran
description: Oil steadied after dropping the most in six months in the previous session on easing geopolitical risks and a broader commodities selloff.
content: Oil steadied after dropping the most in six months in the previous session on easing geopolitical risks and a broader commodities selloff.
